remarks: A lattice translation is the identity function iff all atoms not under the fiducial co-atom ` W ` are equal to their values.  (Contributed by NM, 24-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrneq.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltrneq.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrneq.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrneq.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrneq.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnid $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( A. p e. A ( -. p .<_ W -> ( F ` p ) = p ) <-> F = ( _I |` B ) ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d B p $.
$d F p $.
$d H p $.
$d K p $.
$d T p $.
$d W p $.
